Product Name: DUCO Night Vision Glasses for Driving at Dusk Rainy Day Anti Glare Fit Over Wrap Around Eyewear Glasses UV400 Polarized 8953Y
Color Options: ['Black Size L', 'Black Size M', 'Matte Black', 'Matte Black Size M', 'Transparent Grey', 'Transparent Grey Size M', 'Wine Red Size L', 'Wine Red Size M']
Product Description:
Item model number : 8953Y
Department : womens
Date First Available : March 21, 2013
Manufacturer : DUCO
ASIN : B08RCJXJK6
Product Information:
Functional Glasses, DUCO is No.1-Slogan
Gentle Remind
The instruction about not suitable for driving at night or other low-light conditions for SUNGLASSES only, night vision glasses is for sure suitable for use at night or rainy day.
Night vision glasses cut about 10% to 20% glare from headlight depends on environment.
No such night vision glasses can block 100% glare of headlight because it is contrary to the theory of optics.
Transmittance demand of driving at night is not same as driving at day time.
If more glare are blocked the vision will be more dark, which is dangerous.
Just like gray color sunglasses can cut more glares but it will make the vision darken.
DUCO yellow night vision glasses will not only change light from white to yellow but also balance glare and vision, cut the glare and increase brightness.
It is surely better than naked eyes watching glare when drive in night.
It is also recommended to use for driving in rainy day or dusk.
How to measure your prescription frames for DUCO sunglasses:
1- Measure the widest part of your prescription frames left to right, this is the "width". Next measure the height of the lens with frame included.
2- Choose the DUCO frame (below) that is slightly larger in width and height than your frame measurements.
If your frame width is less than 136mmï¼5.35inchesï¼,height is less than 37mmï¼1.45inchesï¼, please choose M size.
If your frame width is longer than 136mmï¼5.35inchesï¼, shorter than 142mmï¼5.59inchesï¼;height is less than 37mmï¼1.45inchesï¼, please choose L size.
If your frame width is longer than 145mm (5.7inches), and the height is less than 47mm (1.85inches), please choose XL size
If your frame width is longer than 145mmï¼5.7inchesï¼,OR height is larger than 47mmï¼1.85inchesï¼,please DON'T choose it.
Package
Glasses X1, glasses case X1, glasses cloth X1,glasses bag X1.

ASIN : B0CG8R1XQ8
Product Information:
Functional Glasses, DUCO is No.1-Slogan
Gentle Remind
The instruction about not suitable for driving at night or other low-light conditions for SUNGLASSES only, night vision glasses is for sure suitable for use at night or rainy day.
Night vision glasses cut about 10% to 20% glare from headlight depends on environment.
No such night vision glasses can block 100% glare of headlight because it is contrary to the theory of optics.
Transmittance demand of driving at night is not same as driving at day time.
If more glare are blocked the vision will be more dark, which is dangerous.
Just like gray color sunglasses can cut more glares but it will make the vision darken.
DUCO yellow night vision glasses will not only change light from white to yellow but also balance glare and vision, cut the glare and increase brightness.
It is surely better than naked eyes watching glare when drive in night.
It is also recommended to use for driving in rainy day or dusk.
How to measure your prescription frames for DUCO sunglasses:
1- Measure the widest part of your prescription frames left to right, this is the "width". Next measure the height of the lens with frame included.
2- Choose the DUCO frame (below) that is slightly larger in width and height than your frame measurements.
If your frame width is less than 136mmï¼5.35inchesï¼,height is less than 37mmï¼1.45inchesï¼, please choose M size.
If your frame width is longer than 136mmï¼5.35inchesï¼, shorter than 142mmï¼5.59inchesï¼;height is less than 37mmï¼1.45inchesï¼, please choose L size.
If your frame width is longer than 145mm (5.7inches), and the height is less than 47mm (1.85inches), please choose XL size
If your frame width is longer than 145mmï¼5.7inchesï¼,OR height is larger than 47mmï¼1.85inchesï¼,please DON'T choose it.
Package
Glasses X1, glasses case X1, glasses cloth X1,glasses bag X1.

Product Information:
Why choose Duco Polarized Over Sunglasses?
Duco focus on a wide variety of functional glasses from night vision glasses,prescription glasses, sports cycling glasses,anti blue ray radiation computer glasses to UV400 protection polarized sunglasses. We endeavor to provide quality products at prices which provide value to our customers.
Features:
1- Wraparound sunglasses: easy to cover your glasses frame
2- HD polarized sunglasses provide UV400 protection
3- Good for sports and other outdoor activities
4-One-piece Nose Pad
How to measure your prescription frames for DUCO sunglasses:
1- Measure the widest part of your prescription frames left to right, this is the "width". Next measure the height of the lens with frame included.
2- Choose the DUCO frame that is slightly larger in width and height than your frame measurements.
If your frame width is less than 5.7 inches (145 MM),height is less than 1.77inches (45MM), please buy Common size.
If your frame width is less than 5.7 inches (145 MM),height is larger than 1.77inches (45MM) and less than 2.52inches (64MM), please buy Plus size.
If your frame width is longer than 5.7 inches (145 MM) OR height is larger than 2.52inches(64 MM),please DON'T buy it.
Package Includes:
1 * Over Glasses Sunglasses
1 * Hard Case
1 * Polarized Test Card
1 * Microfiber Cleaning Cloth
1 * Microfiber Glasses Pouch
1*Mini screwdriver
Warm Tips:
1. Do not use paper towels or clothing to clean the sunglasses, otherwise skin may be scratched.
2. Never put sunglasses under the front window of a car, especially in summer

ASIN : B0CWNKMY3P
Product Information:
URUMQI night vision glasses are specially designed for those who wear prescription glasses, excellent wrap-around frame provides comprehensive glare protection from the hazards of strong light, relieve eye fatigue and enhance night vision, reduce the risk of driving at night.

â¤Night Vision Lens with Dual Eye Protection Function
âWeaken Light: Adding special polarizing coating, effectively reduce the annoying high beam, make the views look soft without dazzling
âEnhance Contrast: Adding special Nano yellow factor to increase brightness and contrast, make the road more clearly on foggy or snowy days
â¤Wrap-around Design Fit Over Prescription Glasses
âUnique wrap-around design that can be worn directly on existing glasses, save many troubles for those who have to wear prescription glasses
âLittle lenses on two sides broaden the field of view and provide better glare protection
â¤Lightweight & Flexible TR90 Frame for Durability
âTR90 is a kind of memory polymer material, which is the most popular ultra-light frame material in the world
âDurable materials with super toughness that can withstand high impact from outdoor sports, avoid damage to eyes/face due to frame fracture and friction

Note:
1. URUMQI night vision glasses are suitable for night driving or special weather such as fog, cloudy, rain and other low-light conditions!
2. Night vision lenses make everything yellow to protect your eyes, but they CAN'T block all the glare!
3. Due to different visual sense, people have different feeling about glare, some people may not detect the reduction of glare!
4. The small lenses on both sides are ordinary lenses, not polarized lenses!

Package Includes:
1 * Night Vision Glasses
1 * Polarized Test Card
1 * Microfiber Cleaning Cloth
1 * Microfiber Glasses Pouch

âUnique wrap-around design that can be worn directly on existing glasses, save many troubles for those who have to wear prescription glasses
âLittle lenses on two sides broaden the field of view and provide better glare protection
â¤Lightweight & Flexible TR90 Frame for Durability
âTR90 is a kind of memory polymer material, which is the most popular ultra-light frame material in the world
âDurable materials with super toughness that can withstand high impact from outdoor sports, avoid damage to eyes/face due to frame fracture and friction

Note:
1. URUMQI night vision glasses are suitable for night driving or special weather such as fog, cloudy, rain and other low-light conditions!
2. Night vision lenses make everything yellow to protect your eyes, but they CAN'T block all the glare!
3. Due to different visual sense, people have different feeling about glare, some people may not detect the reduction of glare!
4. The small lenses on both sides are ordinary lenses, not polarized lenses!

Product Name: Polarized Floating Fit Over Sunglasses - Wear Over Prescription Glasses - They Float! - Fishing & Boating
Product Description:
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer : No
Package Dimensions : 8 x 5 x 2 inches; 2 ounces
Department : seniors
Date First Available : October 5, 2015
Manufacturer : Ideal Eyewear
ASIN : B01677WP6G
Product Information:
Are you tired of having to choose between having clear vision or protecting your eyes from the glaring sun? The Floating Polarized Fit Over Sunglasses from Ideal Eyewear solve that problem!

Now you can get the crisp, clear vision you depend on from your prescription eyeglasses, while protecting your eyes from the sun and reducing eye strain at the same time. Simply put your fit over sunglasses on over your prescription glasses and you are getting the best of both worlds. The specially designed floating frame allows them to be easily retrieved from the water if accidentally dropped in.

Polarized lenses are better than regular tinted lenses because they eliminate glare of of buildings, vehicles, and water. These polarized fitover sunglasses are especially great for driving, golfing, and fishing.

Sunglasses Dimensions
Outside Dimensions: 6"W x 1.6"H
Will fit over prescription glasses up to 5 1/4"W and 1 1/2"H

Product Information:
Are you tired of having to choose between having clear vision or protecting your eyes from the glaring sun? The Floating Polarized Fit Over Sunglasses from Ideal Eyewear solve that problem!

Now you can get the crisp, clear vision you depend on from your prescription eyeglasses, while protecting your eyes from the sun and reducing eye strain at the same time. Simply put your fit over sunglasses on over your prescription glasses and you are getting the best of both worlds. Product Description:
Department : Unisex
Date First Available : May 17, 2024
ASIN : B0D4CN3QB9
Product Information:
Green lens Sunglasses Or Black lens sunglasses Or Grey lens sunglasses suitable for day use
Polarized lenses for crystal clear vision and maximum sun protection
The glasses not only filter harmful UV rays, but polarize the light and thus reduce annoying reflections.
You will also be astonished: with these eyewear you can even see through the reflections of the sky and clouds on water surfaces or car and window panes.
The attachment is simply placed on the eyeglass frame and can be folded up easily if necessary.
The perfect and cost effective solution for all wearers of glasses
polarized lenses, UV protection
Glare-free light brightness and sharper contrasts
Night vision Yellow sunglasses suitable for night use
High contrast enhancement for absolutely sharp vision in difficult light
Are you feeling well so that you can see everything at night rather blurry? Or turn off the headlights and street lamps? With these glasses you have in the future even at night the full view.
Thanks distinct contrast enhancement you see everything much clearer way, also a treat for your eyes at twilight, fog, snow or heavy rain.
This technique has been used successfully for many years of ski-athletes or aviators.
At night you are now less blinded by bright light sources such as oncoming cars.
Ideal even for eyeglass wearers: you can leave on your visual aid and support the Night Vision comfortable about it.

Product Name: Optix 55 Fit Over HD Day/Night Driving Glasses Wraparound Sunglasses for Men, Women - Anti Glare Polarized Wraparounds
Color Options: ['Night Vision Black', 'Night Vision Tortoise', 'Sunglasses Black']
Product Description:
Department : womens
Date First Available : April 13, 2021
ASIN : B092DY7HRK
Product Information:
PREMIUM QUALITY
Optix 55 wraparound sunglasses are made from high quality materials that are built to last. Both the frames and the lenses are made of polycarbonate. Their curved design easily slips over your regular prescription frames, with sturdy smoked lenses to filter out harsh rays, and side lenses to extend peripheral vision. These frames allow you to have the best of both worlds - clearer vision and UV protection!
Product Features:
Complete Wrap-Around Wear Over Sunglasses
Dimensions: 62 cm Lens Width, 3 cm Nose Bridge, 135 cm Temple
Polycarbonate Frame & Lenses
Smoked Lenses
Matte Black Frame
Choice of Polarized or Regular
Small Holes in Temples to Thread Chain or String
One Piece Frame
Microfiber Pouch/Cleaning Cloth
Unisex
Sturdy matte black frames enable easy handling. Small holes at the temples allow you to insert a strung, chain, or thread so you can wear these around your neck, and the microfiber pouch provides convenient protection and accessibility while on the go and is also great for storage, protecting your frames from dust and debris.
Stylish and fashionable, these matte black frames with dark smoked lenses match nearly any outfit. Their classic, signature look is gender-neutral and appropriate for both men and women to wear.
TAKE YOUR PICK, POLARIZED OR REGULAR
Both version of these sunglasses get rid of excess light in your field of vision, while our polarized specs help reduce glare. While both are suitable for outdoor activities, our polarized frames are especially useful for driving your car and other activities requiring keen visual focus.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED
Optix 55 specializes in all eyewear needs. We back our products with a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you are not completely happy with your purchase, please contact a customer representative and let us improve your experience!

Product Information:
Want to wear sunglasses while still enjoying clear vision?

Wearing sunglasses outdoors helps shield your eyes from the sun's glare. But if you wear eyeglasses, you know that you just can't take your glasses off and wear a pair of shades anytime you want.

If you want to enjoy clear eyesight while keeping your eyes shielded from bright lights or excessive glare from the sun, these fit-over sunglasses are the perfect solution.

Step outside without constantly squinting with the YOGO VISION Fit Over Sunglasses.

Enjoy the outdoor view on a bright and sunny day. These sunglasses are designed to fit over your existing eyeglasses, giving you protection from harmful UV rays while allowing you to enjoy crystal clear vision.

The UV400 protective lenses on these sunglasses block out 100% of UVA, UVB, and UVC rays. These polarized triacetate lenses are also meant to eliminate glare, ensuring all-day eye comfort while you are outdoors.

Not sure if these fit overs will work with your eyeglasses? As long as your eyeglasses do not exceed 5.7" in width and 2" in height, they will easily fit under these fit over sunglasses.

Need more time to make a decision? Here are more reasons to love these fit overs:

ð¶ï¸ Trendy and durable TC frame
ð¶ï¸ Lens measures 2.52" wide, bridge measures 0.71" wide
ð¶ï¸ Lens withstands scratches and impact
ð¶ï¸ Lens coloring system adds contrast without affecting natural colors
ð¶ï¸ 5" arm length, 2" frame height, 5.7" full frame width

Stay in style and protect your eyes on a sunny day. Add the YOGO VISION Fit Over Sunglasses to your cart NOW!

If you want to enjoy clear eyesight while keeping your eyes shielded from bright lights or excessive glare from the sun, these fit-over sunglasses are the perfect solution.

Step outside without constantly squinting with the YOGO VISION Fit Over Sunglasses.

Enjoy the outdoor view on a bright and sunny day. These sunglasses are designed to fit over your existing eyeglasses, giving you protection from harmful UV rays while allowing you to enjoy crystal clear vision.

The UV400 protective lenses on these sunglasses block out 100% of UVA, UVB, and UVC rays. These polarized triacetate lenses are also meant to eliminate glare, ensuring all-day eye comfort while you are outdoors.

Not sure if these fit overs will work with your eyeglasses? As long as your eyeglasses do not exceed 5.7" in width and 2" in height, they will easily fit under these fit over sunglasses.

Product Information:
Want to wear sunglasses while still enjoying clear vision?

Wearing sunglasses outdoors helps shield your eyes from the sun's glare. But if you wear eyeglasses, you know that you just can't take your glasses off and wear a pair of shades anytime you want.

If you want to enjoy clear eyesight while keeping your eyes shielded from bright lights or excessive glare from the sun, these fit-over sunglasses are the perfect solution.

Step outside without constantly squinting with the YOGO VISION Fit Over Sunglasses.

Enjoy the outdoor view on a bright and sunny day. These sunglasses are designed to fit over your existing eyeglasses, giving you protection from harmful UV rays while allowing you to enjoy crystal clear vision.

The UV400 protective lenses on these sunglasses block out 100% of UVA, UVB, and UVC rays. These polarized triacetate lenses are also meant to eliminate glare, ensuring all-day eye comfort while you are outdoors.

Not sure if these fit overs will work with your eyeglasses? As long as your eyeglasses do not exceed 5.7" in width and 2" in height, they will easily fit under these fit over sunglasses.

ð¶ï¸ Lens coloring system adds contrast without affecting natural colors

Stay in style and protect your eyes on a sunny day. Add the YOGO VISION Fit Over Sunglasses to your cart NOW!

Product Information:
Are you tired of having to choose between having clear vision or protecting your eyes from the glaring sun? These great Fit Over Sunglasses from Ideal Eyewear solve that problem!

Now you can get the crisp, clear vision you depend on from your prescription eyeglasses, while protecting your eyes from the sun and reducing eye strain at the same time. Simply put your fit over sunglasses on over your prescription glasses and you are getting the best of both worlds.

Blue Blocker HD lenses are better than regular tinted lenses because they help eliminate glare, and by filtering the blue light spectrum they provide excellent visual clarity. These high density fitover sunglasses are especially great for driving, golfing, and anything outdoors.

Product Information: Discover the better way to protect your eyes with fit over sunglasses. Eye health experts recommend protecting your eyes with sunglasses every time you head outdoors, but that's not easy to do when you have to wear eyeglasses. Over the glasses sunglasses are the most affordable answer to your dilemma! With cover over sunglasses, you can reduce UV exposure from the front, top, and sides of your eyes while wearing your everyday eyeglasses. The wear over sunglasses shell is designed to fit over all types of eyewear to provide an effective shield against the sun. Why should you use polarized lenses? Polarized lenses cut down on glare to make it easier for you to see on bright days. These fit over polarized sunglasses are made from lightweight, heavy-duty, wear and tear scratch resistant plastic, so they can outlast other wear over sunglasses! Fitover sunglasses can be worn by men and women. Wear over sunglasses are trendy fashion pieces, they are also designed to provide an unparalleled level of protection and optimal comfort while golfing, driving, fishing and all water sports and outside activities.

Product Name: Extra Large Cover Ups â Fit Over Sunglasses For People Who Wear Prescription Glasses in the Sun
Color Options: ['Black', 'Clear']
Product Description:
Department : Unisex
Date First Available : February 7, 2024
Manufacturer : Mass Vision
ASIN : B0CV5CW4VZ
Product Information:
Large fit over sunglasses are a stylish and practical accessory designed to provide maximum coverage and protection for individuals who wear prescription eyeglasses. These sunglasses are crafted with a thoughtful blend of fashion and function, ensuring that users can maintain their visual acuity while shielding their eyes from harsh sunlight and harmful UV rays.

The defining feature of our large fit over sunglasses is their spacious design, accommodating a variety of prescription eyewear shapes and sizes. The over-sized frames are specifically engineered to fit comfortably over existing glasses, eliminating the need for cumbersome clip-on attachments or the inconvenience of switching between eyewear. This makes them an ideal solution for individuals who require corrective lenses but still want the benefits of sunglasses without sacrificing style or convenience.

One of the primary advantages of our large fit over sunglasses is their exceptional sun protection. The expansive lenses wrap around the sides of the face, providing a wide field of vision and minimizing exposure to sunlight from various angles. This comprehensive coverage not only shields the eyes from direct sunlight but also helps reduce glare and reflections, enhancing visual comfort in bright conditions.

The lenses of our large fit over sunglasses are crafted from high-quality materials with UV protection, blocking harmful UVA and UVB rays. This is crucial for maintaining eye health and preventing conditions such as cataracts, macular degeneration, and other sun-related eye issues. The sunglasses act as a barrier against the sun's harmful rays, promoting long-term ocular well-being for individuals who wear prescription glasses.

Moreover, the design of these sunglasses often incorporates lightweight and durable materials, ensuring that the additional eyewear layer does not cause discomfort or add unnecessary weight.

Product Name: Fit Over Glasses Sunglasses for Women, Polarized Oversized Sun Glasses for Prescription Glasses UV400 Protection
Product Description:

Department : Unisex Adult
Date First Available : June 26, 2023
ASIN : B0D2S6919W
Product Information:
GEGURI Polarized Sunglasses Over Glasses are specially designed for individuals who wear prescription glasses. The oversized frame and wide temples provide extensive coverage, effectively preventing glare and making them perfect for driving, fishing, playing golf, running, and more.
Experience HD Polarized Sunglasses for ultimate UV400 protection. UV400 protection is the highest level of lens protection, offering nearly 100% defense against harmful ultraviolet rays.
The addition of polarized coatings to our sunglasses helps reduce annoying glare reflected from roads, snow, water, and other horizontal surfaces. This feature ensures clear and undisturbed views without dazzling.
Our Wrap Around Sunglasses are designed to fit comfortably over prescription glasses. They save the hassle for those who require prescription glasses and provide comprehensive glare protection with an ergonomic wrap-around design and oversized lenses. Say goodbye to eye fatigue and reduce driving risks.
Enjoy the benefits of our Lightweight & Flexible Frame, which guarantees durability. Crafted from tough materials, our sunglasses can withstand high impact during outdoor activities, ensuring the safety of your eyes and face by preventing frame fractures and friction damage.
Wondering if GEGURI Polarized Sunglasses will fit over your prescription glasses? Follow these simple steps:
Measure the width of your prescription frames from the widest part, left to right. Also, measure the height of the lens including the frame.
Ensure that the sunglasses frame is slightly larger in both width and height compared to your frame measurements.

1 * Fitovers Sunglasses

Product Information: Discover the better way to protect your eyes with fit over sunglasses. Eye health experts recommend protecting your eyes with sunglasses every time you head outdoors, but that's not easy to do when you have to wear eyeglasses. Over the glasses sunglasses are the most affordable answer to your dilemma! With cover over sunglasses, you can reduce UV exposure from the front, top, and sides of your eyes while wearing your everyday eyeglasses. The wear over sunglasses shell is designed to fit over all types of eyewear to provide an effective shield against the sun. Why should you use polarized lenses? Polarized lenses cut down on glare to make it easier for you to see on bright days. These fit over polarized sunglasses are made from lightweight, heavy-duty, wear and tear scratch resistant plastic, so they can outlast other wear over sunglasses! Fitover sunglasses can be worn by men and women. Wear over sunglasses are trendy fashion pieces, they are also designed to provide an unparalleled level of protection and optimal comfort while golfing, driving, fishing and all water sports and outside activities.
